greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of odd divisors of n <= sqrt(n).
comment: a(n) = Sum{d : d = A182469(n,k), d <= A000196(n), k=1..A001227(n)}. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 05 2015
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(ir = sqrtint(n)); sumdiv(n, d, (d % 2) * (d <= ir) * d); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 14 2014
a069289 n = sum $ takeWhile (<= a000196 n) $ a182469_row n
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 14 2002
